title: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
creator: Dick, Philip K.
description: In post-apocalyptic San Francisco, bounty hunter Rick Deckard hunts rogue androids while questioning what it means to be human. This seminal work explores empathy, consciousness, and reality, serving as the philosophical foundation for Blade Runner.
subject: cyberpunk
philosophical
